channel.title: Dementhium Login Problem
channel.description:
My Source will run but it won't run correctly. When I try to run it on my computer, it says running cache and a lot of other things also. When I try to run the source on the VPS i get this.. And yes I did put the cache in the correct spot on the source, and obviously it does connect to the source when your logging in because i get errors.
When I try to load the Source on VPS it just says "server bound to Port 43594."
When I try to connect to the server it says "Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support."
In the source it says. [QUOTE]" Server bound to port - 43594 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\testaccount.bin (The syste m cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java: 38) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:212) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\testaccount.bin (The syste m cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.fileBuffer(FileUtilities.java:20) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:133) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:218) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/Quote]
Inside of saving errors.. [Quote] java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java:38) org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150) org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107) org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:212) java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Player testaccount [/quote]
Anyone know the problem why my source won't correctly run on the VPS?

@Ashi wrote:

This may help not sure if it will fix problem but go to your root folder and create a new folder called ecogames
then try running your server again.

item.title: Dementhium Login Problem
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
item.description:
@giveitup wrote:

My Source will run but it won’t run correctly. When I try to run it on my computer, it says running cache and a lot of other things also. When I try to run the source on the VPS i get this… And yes I did put the cache in the correct spot on the source, and obviously it does connect to the source when your logging in because i get errors.

When I try to load the Source on VPS it just says “server bound to Port 43594.”

When I try to connect to the server it says “Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support.”

In the source it says. [QUOTE]"
Server bound to port - 43594
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\testaccount.bin (The syste
m cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java:
38)
at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150)
at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107)
at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:212)
at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\testaccount.bin (The syste
m cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.fileBuffer(FileUtilities.java:20)
at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:133)
at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:218)
at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/Quote]

Inside of saving errors…

java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java:38)
org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150)
org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107)
org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:212)
java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source)
java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source)
java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)
java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Player testaccount

Anyone know the problem why my source won’t correctly run on the VPS?
